about.title: About Me
about.section1: I'm a software developer and Systems Analysis and Development student at the University of Passo Fundo (UPF), based in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil. I build dynamic web applications, back-end systems, and productivity tools such as CLIs and automations to streamline workflows and learning.
about.section2: Passionate about web design, photography, technical writing, and entrepreneurship, I enjoy applying these interests in my projects as opportunities to learn and explore them further.
about.section3: I'm adaptable and committed to staying up-to-date with industry trends while grounded in traditional and reliable technologies. Feel free to explore my work and reach out — I'm always open to opportunities to learn and collaborate!
